statements.select: SELECT PE.Location_Code, T.Nombre_tienda, SUM(PE.Quantity) AS Quantity FROM ProductsExtracts PE INNER JOIN Tiendas T ON PE.Location_Code = T.Number_tienda WHERE BeginDate BETWEEN #DateIni# AND #DateEnd# AND Location_Code = #NumTienda# AND Product_Description LIKE '%CANELAZO%' GROUP BY PE.Location_Code, T.Nombre_tienda, T.Orden ORDER BY T.Orden DESC
